Kup/elita:

Kup looked at Elita, who was sleeping in his arms and dreaming =
with her missing parents. The old autobot said  in low voice trying not to =
awake her "I have a bad feeling... I be right back".

The old Maximal leave=
 the place and headed to Elita's room; he walked inside and leave elita in =
her bed, he set her teddy bear in her arms and leave the room. he came back=
 to Lord elder and said "something must be done" he looked his weapons and =
sighed for a second... Megatron, the image of the bot that was in stasis, c=
rossed his mind; if he died in the ark nothing like this would have happen,=
 the idea started to feel atractive... Elita and nightlight were innocents =
victims that didnt deserve that suffering.



From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: =
Wednesday, April 07, 2010 11:23 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re:=
 The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Who: LORD ELDER, Kup, Elita
=
Location: The Ark's command center

> "Maybe the situation isnt so serious =
as it looks"said doutbly Kup

Lord Elder nodded as he received further word=
 from Tuscon, "You may be right."

Elder looked at his screen in front of h=
im, "But two things still bug
me." he said as he manipulated the controls i=
n front of him, "That
sensor ghost has been with us for quite some time. We=
 cannot know what
it is seen. If it is Predacon or Minion it could be a spy=
." Elder
frowned, "and if it is, we don't know what it has seen, and what i=
t
has communicated to its masters."

Elder started to open a channel to Nig=
htshift, but then remembered
that he was in a communications black out, "Al=
so I am worried about
Nightshift. The Predacons are not idiots. I wish we h=
ad spent more
time thinking this plan through. Just trapsing into the preda=
con
headquarters with only the predacon spark signature was probably not
th=
e best plan." Elder tapped his fingers on the console in
frustration, "I wi=
sh we knew what was going on!"

(TAG)

Preston
